mapper.select: select a.rid as "ID" ,-- 记录编号 b.inhosno as "ZYID" ,--住院号 b.patientid as "PatientId",-- 病例号 a.NEWSUBJECTCODE as "InDeptId" ,-- 转入科室编号 a.CRTE_TIME as "InDeptAt" ,--入科时间 a.OLDSUBJECTCODE as "OutDeptId" ,--转出科室编号 a.CRTE_TIME as "OutDeptAt" ,--出科时间 c.bedno as "BedNo" --床号 from ipr_inpatientinfo b,IPR_SHIFTINFO a left join inr_receiveinfo c on a.orgcode =c.orgcode and a.inid=c.inid where a.orgcode =b.orgcode and a.inid=b.inid and a.shifttype='RB' and a.orgcode =#{map.OrgCode} and b.inhosno=#{map.ID} and a.crte_time >=to_date(#{map.StartDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.crte_time <=to_date(#{map.EndDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
